products.title: Hive Blackout Silkweave Elephant Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their hive blackout silkweave range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors.
